citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:05-1:35pm on 23-
FEB-22. Inspector left a message on the listed phone and knocked at door. No answer was received within 30 minutes of
initial contact.
End Section
